original_title: Why I Wore Lipstick to My Mastectomy
overview: Shortly after graduating from Columbia University's Graduate School of Journalism, Geralyn Lucas lands her dream job working for 20/20. Lucas is then diagnosed with breast cancer at the age of 27 and has a dilemma - whether to have a lumpectomy or the potentially safer mastectomy.
title: Why I Wore Lipstick to My Mastectomy
